meanings.sent1: Crocheters enjoy creating beautiful items with yarn.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of crocheters at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The crocheters in the park were having a yarn-tastic time.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like skilled crocheters, weaving a tapestry of colors.
meanings.sent5: The community center was buzzing with the chatter of crocheters sharing tips and patterns.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the craft of crocheting.
meanings.sent1: Many crocheters gather at the local library for a weekly meetup.
meanings.sent2: Crocheters often donate their handmade items to charity.
meanings.sent3: The crocheters at the workshop were hooked on learning new stitches.
meanings.sent4: In the world of crafting, crocheters are known for their creativity and patience.
meanings.sent5: The group of crocheters worked together to complete a large blanket for a community project.
